--- named_schema_create_table_backquoted.sql
CREATE TABLE `ORDER`.`ORDER`(PK INT64) PRIMARY KEY(PK)

  Rparen:      53,
  IfNotExists: false,

    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 13,
        NameEnd: 20,
        Name:    "ORDER",
      },
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 21,
        NameEnd: 28,
        Name:    "ORDER",
      },
    },
  },

    &ast.ColumnDef{
      Null: -1,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 29,
        NameEnd: 31,
        Name:    "PK",
      },
      Type: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
        NamePos: 32,
        Name:    "INT64",
      },
      NotNull:        false,
      DefaultExpr:    (*ast.ColumnDefaultExpr)(nil),
      GeneratedExpr:  (*ast.GeneratedColumnExpr)(nil),
      IdentityColumn: (*ast.IdentityColumn)(nil),
      Hidden:         -1,
      Options:        (*ast.Options)(nil),
    },
  },

      DirPos: -1,

        NamePos: 51,

    },

--- SQL
